t: Amazon.com: Smart Oil Gauge : Alexa Skills
s: The Smart Oil Gauge skill allows our users to ask Alexa how much heating oil they have in their tank, and how much oil they are burning. In order to access this skill, users must have a Smart Oil Gauge wireless level sensor installed, and an active account linked to that sensor.
